00263         height = _CGRectGetHeight(bounds); 
00264     
00265     if ([self isVertical])
00266     {
00267         var decrementLineSize = [self currentValueForThemeAttribute:"decrement-line-size"],
00268             incrementLineSize = [self currentValueForThemeAttribute:"increment-line-size"],
00269             effectiveDecrementLineHeight = decrementLineSize.height + trackInset.top,
00270             effectiveIncrementLineHeight = incrementLineSize.height + trackInset.bottom,
00271             slotHeight = height - effectiveDecrementLineHeight - effectiveIncrementLineHeight,
00272             minimumKnobLength = [self currentValueForThemeAttribute:"minimum-knob-length"],
00273             knobWidth = width - knobInset.left - knobInset.right,
00274             knobHeight = MAX(minimumKnobLength, (slotHeight * _knobProportion)),
00275             knobLocation = effectiveDecrementLineHeight + (slotHeight - knobHeight) * [self floatValue];
00276 
00277         _partRects[CPScrollerDecrementPage] = _CGRectMake(0.0, effectiveDecrementLineHeight, width, knobLocation - effectiveDecrementLineHeight);
00278         _partRects[CPScrollerKnob]          = _CGRectMake(knobInset.left, knobLocation, knobWidth, knobHeight);
00279         _partRects[CPScrollerIncrementPage] = _CGRectMake(0.0, knobLocation + knobHeight, width, height - (knobLocation + knobHeight) - effectiveIncrementLineHeight);
00280         _partRects[CPScrollerKnobSlot]      = _CGRectMake(trackInset.left, effectiveDecrementLineHeight, width - trackInset.left - trackInset.right, slotHeight);
00281         _partRects[CPScrollerDecrementLine] = _CGRectMake(0.0, 0.0, decrementLineSize.width, decrementLineSize.height);
00282         _partRects[CPScrollerIncrementLine] = _CGRectMake(0.0, height - incrementLineSize.height, incrementLineSize.width, incrementLineSize.height);  
00283     }
00284 
00285     else
00286     {
00287         var decrementLineSize = [self currentValueForThemeAttribute:"decrement-line-size"],
00288             incrementLineSize = [self currentValueForThemeAttribute:"increment-line-size"],
00289             effectiveDecrementLineWidth = decrementLineSize.width + trackInset.left,
00290             effectiveIncrementLineWidth = incrementLineSize.width + trackInset.right;
00291             slotWidth = width - effectiveDecrementLineWidth - effectiveIncrementLineWidth,
00292             minimumKnobLength = [self currentValueForThemeAttribute:"minimum-knob-length"],
00293             knobWidth = MAX(minimumKnobLength, (slotWidth * _knobProportion)),
00294             knobHeight = height - knobInset.top - knobInset.bottom,
00295             knobLocation = effectiveDecrementLineWidth + (slotWidth - knobWidth) * [self floatValue];
00296 
00297         _partRects[CPScrollerDecrementPage] = _CGRectMake(effectiveDecrementLineWidth, 0.0, knobLocation - effectiveDecrementLineWidth, height);
00298         _partRects[CPScrollerKnob]          = _CGRectMake(knobLocation, knobInset.top, knobWidth, knobHeight);
00299         _partRects[CPScrollerIncrementPage] = _CGRectMake(knobLocation + knobWidth, 0.0, width - (knobLocation + knobWidth) - effectiveIncrementLineWidth, height);
00300         _partRects[CPScrollerKnobSlot]      = _CGRectMake(effectiveDecrementLineWidth, trackInset.top, slotWidth, height - trackInset.top - trackInset.bottom);
00301         _partRects[CPScrollerDecrementLine] = _CGRectMake(0.0, 0.0, decrementLineSize.width, decrementLineSize.height);
00302         _partRects[CPScrollerIncrementLine] = _CGRectMake(width - incrementLineSize.width, 0.0, incrementLineSize.width, incrementLineSize.height);
00303     }

- (CPScrollerPart) testPart: (CGPoint)  aPoint   [implementation]

Returns the part of the scroller that would be hit by aPoint.

Parameters:
aPoint the simulated point hit
Returns:
the part of the scroller that intersects the point

Definition at line 205 of file CPScroller.j.

00205                           :(CGPoint)aPoint
00206 {
00207     aPoint = [self convertPoint:aPoint fromView:nil];
00208     
00209     // The ordering of these tests is important.  We check the knob and 
00210     // page rects first since they may overlap with the arrows.
00211     
00212     if (CGRectContainsPoint([self rectForPart:CPScrollerKnob], aPoint))
00213         return CPScrollerKnob;
00214     
00215     if (CGRectContainsPoint([self rectForPart:CPScrollerDecrementPage], aPoint))
00216         return CPScrollerDecrementPage;
00217     
00218     if (CGRectContainsPoint([self rectForPart:CPScrollerIncrementPage], aPoint))
00219         return CPScrollerIncrementPage;
00220     
00221     if (CGRectContainsPoint([self rectForPart:CPScrollerDecrementLine], aPoint))
00222         return CPScrollerDecrementLine;
00223     
00224     if (CGRectContainsPoint([self rectForPart:CPScrollerIncrementLine], aPoint))
00225         return CPScrollerIncrementLine;
00226     
00227     if (CGRectContainsPoint([self rectForPart:CPScrollerKnobSlot], aPoint))
00228         return CPScrollerKnobSlot;
00229 
00230     return CPScrollerNoPart;
00231 }

- (void) trackKnob: (CPEvent)  anEvent   [implementation]

Tracks the knob.

Parameters:
anEvent the input event

Definition at line 407 of file CPScroller.j.

00407                  :(CPEvent)anEvent
00408 {
00409     var type = [anEvent type];
00410     
00411     if (type === CPLeftMouseUp)
00412     {
00413         _hitPart = CPScrollerNoPart;
00414         
00415         return;
00416     }
00417     
00418     if (type === CPLeftMouseDown)
00419     {
00420         _trackingFloatValue = [self floatValue];
00421         _trackingStartPoint = [self convertPoint:[anEvent locationInWindow] fromView:nil];
00422     }
00423     
00424     else if (type === CPLeftMouseDragged)
00425     {
00426         var knobRect = [self rectForPart:CPScrollerKnob],
00427             knobSlotRect = [self rectForPart:CPScrollerKnobSlot],
00428             remainder = ![self isVertical] ? (_CGRectGetWidth(knobSlotRect) - _CGRectGetWidth(knobRect)) : (_CGRectGetHeight(knobSlotRect) - _CGRectGetHeight(knobRect));
00429             
00430         if (remainder <= 0)
00431             [self setFloatValue:0.0];
00432         else
00433         {
00434             var location = [self convertPoint:[anEvent locationInWindow] fromView:nil];
00435                 delta = ![self isVertical] ? location.x - _trackingStartPoint.x : location.y - _trackingStartPoint.y;
00436 
00437             [self setFloatValue:_trackingFloatValue + delta / remainder];
00438         }
00439     }
00440     
00441     [CPApp setTarget:self selector:@selector(trackKnob:) forNextEventMatchingMask:CPLeftMouseDraggedMask | CPLeftMouseUpMask untilDate:nil inMode:nil dequeue:YES];
00442 
00443     [self sendAction:[self action] to:[self target]];
00444 }

- (void) trackScrollButtons: (CPEvent)  anEvent   [implementation]

Tracks the scroll button.

Parameters:
anEvent the input event

Definition at line 450 of file CPScroller.j.

00450                           :(CPEvent)anEvent
00451 {
00452     var type = [anEvent type];
00453 
00454     if (type === CPLeftMouseUp)
00455     {
00456         [self highlight:NO];
00457         [CPEvent stopPeriodicEvents];
00458         
00459         _hitPart = CPScrollerNoPart;
00460         
00461         return;
00462     }
00463     
00464     if (type === CPLeftMouseDown)
00465     {
00466         _trackingPart = [self hitPart];
00467         
00468         _trackingStartPoint = [self convertPoint:[anEvent locationInWindow] fromView:nil];
00469 
00470         if ([anEvent modifierFlags] & CPAlternateKeyMask)
00471         {
00472             if (_trackingPart == CPScrollerDecrementLine)
00473                 _hitPart = CPScrollerDecrementPage;
00474             
00475             else if (_trackingPart == CPScrollerIncrementLine)
00476                 _hitPart = CPScrollerIncrementPage;
00477             
00478             else if (_trackingPart == CPScrollerDecrementPage || _trackingPart == CPScrollerIncrementPage)
00479             {
00480                 var knobRect = [self rectForPart:CPScrollerKnob],
00481                     knobWidth = ![self isVertical] ? _CGRectGetWidth(knobRect) : _CGRectGetHeight(knobRect),
00482                     knobSlotRect = [self rectForPart:CPScrollerKnobSlot],
00483                     remainder = (![self isVertical] ? _CGRectGetWidth(knobSlotRect) : _CGRectGetHeight(knobSlotRect)) - knobWidth;
00484 
00485                 [self setFloatValue:((![self isVertical] ? _trackingStartPoint.x - _CGRectGetMinX(knobSlotRect) : _trackingStartPoint.y - _CGRectGetMinY(knobSlotRect)) - knobWidth / 2.0) / remainder];
00486                 
00487                 _hitPart = CPScrollerKnob;
00488                 
00489                 [self sendAction:[self action] to:[self target]];        
00490                 
00491                 // Now just track the knob.
00492                 return [self trackKnob:anEvent];
00493             }
00494         }
00495         
00496         [self highlight:YES];
00497         [self sendAction:[self action] to:[self target]];
00498         
00499         [CPEvent startPeriodicEventsAfterDelay:0.5 withPeriod:0.04];
00500     }
00501     
00502     else if (type === CPLeftMouseDragged)
00503     {
00504         _trackingStartPoint = [self convertPoint:[anEvent locationInWindow] fromView:nil];
00505         
00506         if (_trackingPart == CPScrollerDecrementPage || _trackingPart == CPScrollerIncrementPage)
00507         {
00508             var hitPart = [self testPart:[anEvent locationInWindow]];
00509             
00510             if (hitPart == CPScrollerDecrementPage || hitPart == CPScrollerIncrementPage)
00511             {
00512                 _trackingPart = hitPart;
00513                 _hitPart = hitPart;
00514             }
00515         }
00516         
00517         [self highlight:CGRectContainsPoint([self rectForPart:_trackingPart], _trackingStartPoint)];
00518     }
00519     else if (type == CPPeriodic && CGRectContainsPoint([self rectForPart:_trackingPart], _trackingStartPoint))
00520         [self sendAction:[self action] to:[self target]];
00521     
00522     [CPApp setTarget:self selector:@selector(trackScrollButtons:) forNextEventMatchingMask:CPPeriodicMask | CPLeftMouseDraggedMask | CPLeftMouseUpMask untilDate:nil inMode:nil dequeue:YES];
00523 
00524 }
